actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Army and the Chief of Engineers to act on certain applications within 90 days or explain his failure to do so.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Army and the Chief of Engineers to act to grant or deny applications for permits or licenses within 90 days or explain his failure to do so to the applicant in writing.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Army and the Chief of Engineers to act on certain applications within 90 days or explain his failure to do so.
